title: thalachi nanthanE
sahitya:
talaci nantanE nA tanuvEmO jhallanErA

anupallavi

 jalajavairi dharAdi vidhIndrula celimi pUjalandina nEnu nE

caraNam 1

 rOTiki gaTTa dAgina nI lIlalu mUTikekkuvaina nIdu guNamulu 
kOTi madana lAvaNyamulaina sATi gAni nI divya rUpamunu
   
caraNam 2

 nidrAlasya rahita shrI rAma bhadrAnilaja sulabha samsAra-
cidrAttini dIrcE shaktini vidhi rudrAdula nutamau caritambunu
   
caraNam 3

 pAda vijita muni tAruNi shApa mOda tyAgarAja vinuta dharApa
nAda brahmAnanda rUpa vEda sAramau nAma dhEyamunu
